üè∑Ô∏è "...mimic‚Äôs the effects of a jam flavoured enhancement... a universal flavour that is intended to create the effect of a jam cooked fruit or nut...works well with citrus fruits to create a marmalade spread or glaze tasting e-juice...a preserve that has chunks or fruit surrounded by jelly. Other uses could create the conserve effect of using fruits and dried nuts in your recipe. The classic peanut butter & jam or jam filled donuts could shine by using this flavour in your recipe." - [Link: Jam It](https://www.vapetrain.com.au/shop/vt-concentrates/jam-it-flavour-concentrate-for-e-liquid-enhancement/)

Recommendation Rate: 2-5% in a Mix ‚Äì Standalone 5-9% | Steep Time Guide ‚Äì 4-10+ days

Aroma Stick: Bright Lemon/Lime-like Citrus...Passionfruit?

Re-test @ Lower than 9% | Too High

SFT - 5%

‚ñ∫Tester Bottle

üîπVape: Banana Custard (VTA) + Jam It 5%

\- Knuckle: Sweet Banana; Light Citrus, Mod. Thick

\- Flavor Description: Noticeable Changes ‚úÖ| Sweeter and Softer Banana Flavor (Semi-Ripe); mild Tartness with notes of Pomegranate/Passionfruit\* like flavor. Rounded Body with a Smooth, Mod. Thick Fluffy\* Mouth Feel.

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: No Identifiable Off Notes

\- Not so much of a ‚ÄúJam‚Äù but more of Chewy Marshmallow Fluff Texture; Like the Texture of Devon Cream (VTA)

\- Similar Additive properties as Candy/Jammy Wizard (FA) ‚Äì but lighter / less dense with noticeable Pom/Passionfruit Flavor

\- Uses: Additive to Fruity\* Flavors for - Body, Texture, Weight + Mouthfeel
